data.title: Belleville General Hospital Foundation
data.meta_description: We're In For Better Healthcare. Are You? - A fresh brand identity & new website helped raise the profile of this local charity – increasing annual donations by almost 400% in just 3 years. The Belleville General Hospital Foundation plays an integral role in providing better healthcare to the community by raising money to buy equipment for the Hospital – something the provincial government does not fund.  After an exhaustive research process, including interviews with key stakeholders, staff, committee members, hospital administration, donors and members of the community, it was discovered that BGHF did not have a clear brand position and had low awareness within the community it served – not appearing in the top 5 charities of choice among donors in the community.  A distinctive brand identity system was created to become the extendible platform for all BGHF communication efforts. The new BGHF identity was embraced by the foundation, injecting life into its fundraising efforts. The new brand platform was deployed across all BGHF fundraising campaigns, signage, brand collateral and a new website with a full content management system.
data.text:
A fresh brand identity & new website helped raise the profile of this local charity – increasing annual donations by almost 400% in just 3 years.

The Belleville General Hospital Foundation plays an integral role in providing better healthcare to the community by raising money to buy equipment for the Hospital – something the provincial government does not fund.

After an exhaustive research process, including interviews with key stakeholders, staff, committee members, hospital administration, donors and members of the community, it was discovered that BGHF did not have a clear brand position and had low awareness within the community it served – not appearing in the top 5 charities of choice among donors in the community.

A distinctive brand identity system was created to become the extendible platform for all BGHF communication efforts. The new BGHF identity was embraced by the foundation, injecting life into its fundraising efforts. The new brand platform was deployed across all BGHF fundraising campaigns, signage, brand collateral and a new website with a full content management system.
